text: Bossier City is the seventh most populous city in the state of Louisiana. is in Bossier Parish, it is a inner suburb of Shreveport. The population, as of 2020, is less than 63,000. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Cities in Louisiana Category:Settlements in Bossier Parish, Louisiana Category:1907 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in Louisiana
title: Bossier City, Louisiana
